message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,000,000.  I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations.
Alice, your initial offer is significantly higher than my budget.  While I see the value in this product, I'm only able to offer $800,000 at this time. This is my best and final offer.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $800,000 is significantly below its true value.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,750,000.  This is a fair offer considering the potential returns you'll see.
